# Signed_14173467011297444/shim64-bit.efi ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 


### Description

This was provided by Debian and revoked Apr-21
- **UUID**: d20a9d4f-d336-4400-b839-d2334be05e06

- **Author**: Michael Haag
